title: Cooperative Learning-Based Project Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories in social sciences and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaboration environment construction using digital tools and operation of a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can clearly distinguish and execute role responsibilities at each stage of collaborative learning through a 4-week team project.
Learners can systematically document project progress using digital collaboration tools (Google Workspace/Notion).
Learners can analyze and record team members' contributions in three tiers (high/medium/low) through peer review and self-assessment.
Learners can submit a revised project plan within 72 hours based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
